biblStruct.note: In recent times, the Aramaeans of the Tur Abdin had to bear political and physical suppression by the Turkish government and their Kurdish environment. The author discusses the political and sociological setting of the Aramaean community in the Tur Abdin region in southeastern Turkey. The basis of this essay is a corpus of interviews the author took in the region in 2010.
